11. You are my son. Out of my natural love and affection for you, out of my affection for you as a son, and considering love as a reward, and with the intention of providing you with some stability since you are dependent on me, and with the intention that you should live with dignity, for the financial growth of our family, I have inherited the R.C.C., which has full rights and experiences, and which has no obligations, as mentioned in the third paragraph below. I have full experience in slab house properties and I hereby give you the undisputed property worth Rs. 8,77,000/- in words, eight lakh seventy seven thousand rupees, free of charge and without any compensation, free of any mortgages, court orders, purchase agreements, bindings of the family division, seizures, etc. on the property. Therefore, you have included the property in your rights from this time and have it registered in your name in all accounts, and you have paid the taxes due to the Sri Panchayat from this time according to the customs, and with all the rights of loan, donation, sale, right of ownership, and all the rights of the owner, you have arranged for your son and grandson to enjoy it freely and happily according to your will, and you have written and given this settlement deed. I assure you that neither I, my heirs, my heirs, you, your heirs or your heirs will ever be able to make any disputes about the property in the future, and I have written and given this settlement deed with my full consent. The property is A.P. Not an assigned property under Ordinance 2/77.

boundaries.boundaryS: Vacant Site of Kommanapalli Ramu, RCC House of Yammamsetti naga Apparao

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 461 of 2026, dated 27/Jan/2026, executed by Nadi Setti Apparao, in favour of his Son, Nadi Setti Ramarao, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 96.89 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 1-8, Old Assessment No. 8, New Assessment No. 211802000150, comprised in survey number 59, situated in Karaka Village and Gramapanchayat, Butchayyapeta Mandal, within the District of Anakapalli, registered at sub-registrar office Chodavaram is bounded as follows: North by: Road South by: Vacant Site of Kommanapalli Ramu, RCC House of Yammamsetti naga Apparao East by: ACC House of S.K Pentarao West by: RCC House of Adduru Mahesh Note *Schedule property is part of Gramakantam as per recitals of the deed
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
